title: Blast Magician

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Add a charge to your Magical Blast. You may not attack on the same night you perform this action.
- Attack a player with your Magical Blast, dealing a Powerful attack to them and the number of players adjacent to them equal to twice the amount of charges your Magical Blast has. This will remove all charges from Magical Blast.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may only carry a maximum of 2 charges at once.
- A charged Magical Blast will consider the targeted player to be at the center of the attack. For example, a Magical Blast with 1 charge aimed at Player #10 will also attack Player #9 and Player #11.
- If a player is missing from Magical Blast's attack range, that just means your attack has hit one less player. For example, a Magical Blast with 1 charge aimed at Player #10 will not compensate for a missing #9 or #11 by hitting #8 or #12. Example 2: A Magical Blast with 2 charges aimed at Player #3 while only Player #2 is missing will attack Players #1, #3, #4, and #5.
- The player with the lowest number will be considered to be adjacent to Player #1.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you.

desc:
Post 445
*Take 'em all out in one fell swoop. That's the efficient way to do things. Why don't other murderers do this?*
